snippet: Instead of making undercover investigation of animal abuses in factory farms a crime, we need laws that guarantee our right to know how our food is being produced.
abstract: Editorial demands laws that guarantee right to know how food is being produced in factory farms, rather than making undercover investigation of animal abuses a crime.
lead_paragraph: Instead of making undercover investigation of animal abuses in factory farms a crime, we need laws that guarantee our right to know how our food is being produced.

headline.seo: With Ag-Gag Laws, We’re Eating With Our Eyes Closed
